reviewText: Brilliant comedian!!  He takes everyday situations and turns them into hysterically funny routines. He makes observations like George Carlin, does voices like Robin Williams and rolls them all into hilarious & entertaining stories. I want a copy of everything he's done.
Can't play dvd at all, wrong region!
they don't tell you the dvr won't play in dvr players in the us can't even watch it sitting on a shelf collecting dust
Great dvds, very funny , arrived on time
This guy is amazing!! I hurt from laughing.
Very funny guy. Well produced DVD.
